welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Corpus Christi, known for its stunning beaches, vibrant coastal culture, and delicious seafood. We hope you enjoy your time here and take in all the charm this city has to offer. Happy exploring!

restaurants.name: Hacienda Vieja & Cantina
restaurants.description: Hacienda Vieja & Cantina is a mexican restaurant located in Corpus Christi.
restaurants.address: 4301 S Staples St, Corpus Christi, TX 78411

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corpus Christi International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Corpus Christi International Airport serves regional flights and private charters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aransas County Airport offers a comfortable waiting area, restrooms, and a small cafe.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Aransas County Airport is reserved for private flights and offers a luxurious lounge area and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
